description.plain:
Harvey Leigh Cantwell, known as HRVY, is an English singer and songwriter, born on January 28, 1999 in Kent, United Kingdom.

He released his debut EP, Holiday on July 25, 2017, and his second EP, Talk To Ya was released on November 30, 2017.

Alongside cancelling the release of his debut album in 2020, HRVY appeared on Strictly Come Dancing’s eighteenth season.

body.plain:
Harvey Leigh Cantwell, known as HRVY, is an English singer and songwriter, born on January 28, 1999 in Kent, United Kingdom.

He released his debut EP, Holiday on July 25, 2017, and his second EP, Talk To Ya was released on November 30, 2017.

Alongside cancelling the release of his debut album in 2020, HRVY appeared on Strictly Come Dancing’s eighteenth season.

songs.title: Talk to Ya
songs.embed_content: Read “Talk to Ya” by HRVY on Genius

album.full_title: Talk to Ya - EP by HRVY
album.name: Talk to Ya - EP

songs.lyrics:
16 ContributorsTalk to Ya Lyrics[Intro]
I just wanna talk to ya, talk to ya
Take it for my broken paradise

[Verse 1]
Girl, I know you're more than just a number
I know when I look into your eyes
See I can love you more than any other
I know you've been hurt, I'll make it right

[Pre-Chorus]
I know it's hard to trust someone like me
When it's my reputation that's first to speak
I won’t make a promise I can’t keep
'Cause I can give you somethin' that you never had before
[Chorus]
I just wanna talk to ya, talk to ya
Maybe I can mend your heart with mine
I just wanna talk to ya, talk to ya
Take it for my broken paradise
You hit me like a wave, you gotta pull me under
Don't give me a chance to escape
I just wanna talk to ya, talk to ya
Take it for my broken paradise

[Verse 2]
I know everybody if you want it
I don't blame them, I don't trust myself
But, this ain't just like any other morning
And you ain't just like any other girl

[Pre-Chorus]
I know it's hard to trust someone like me
When it's my reputation that's first to speak
I won’t make a promise I can’t keep
'Cause I can give you somethin' that you never had before

[Chorus]
I just wanna talk to ya, talk to ya
Maybe I can mend your heart with mine
I just wanna talk to ya, talk to ya
Take it for my broken paradise
You hit me like a wave, you've gotta pull me under
Don't give me a chance to escape
I just wanna talk to ya, talk to ya
Take it for my broken paradise
You might also like[Chorus]
I just wanna talk to ya, talk to ya
Maybe I can mend your heart with mine
I just wanna talk to ya, talk to ya
Take it for my broken paradise5Embed

songs.title: Phobia
songs.embed_content: Read “Phobia” by HRVY on Genius
songs.lyrics:
16 ContributorsPhobia Lyrics[Verse 1]
I just don't know where to start
Time moves slow, now we're apart
When we first met I was strong
I tell you my story

[Verse 2]
In this it was me and you
Thought that we were winners, oh
Where story heart sinners go
They can't get between us
[Pre-Chorus]
But I've been sleeping with the light on
Like I'm afraid of the dark
Afraid of a broken heart
I don't wanna break your heart
No, no, no

[Chorus]
I've got a phobia of being without ya
I've got a phobia of being alone
It's only a matter of time, girl
Before I break down
Because I can't start being without ya
I've got a phobia of letting you go
And I want you to know
I'm not afraid, no
I'm safe with you

[Verse 3]
We've been holding on so long
Time will make or break us, so
Go with you I can't let go
You know it's about us

[Pre-Chorus]
But I've been sleeping with the light on
Like I'm afraid of the dark
Afraid of a broken heart
I don't wanna break your heart
No, no, no, oh
You might also like[Chorus]
I've got a phobia of being without ya
I've got a phobia of being alone
It's only a matter of time, girl
Before I break down
Because I can't start being without ya
I've got a phobia of letting you go
And I want you to know
I'm not afraid no
I'm safe with you

[Verse 4]
And I don't wanna be alone
'Cause you're the only one for me
And I'm finding it hard to breathe here, breathe here
You could be the only way out of this place that I'm in
It's like I'm living a bad dream, bad dream
And only you can wake me, yeah

[Pre-Chorus]
But I've been sleeping with the light on
Like I'm afraid of the dark
Afraid of a broken heart
I don't wanna break your heart
No, no, no
[Chorus]

I've got a phobia of being alone

Because I can't start being without ya
I've got a phobia of letting you go
And I want you to know
I'm not afraid, no
I'm safe with you oh oh oh oh6Embed
